thread.title: Hotel Arts Barcelona Busines Centre introduces new iLounge
thread.title_full: Hotel Arts Barcelona Busines Centre introduces new iLounge

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Hotel Arts Barcelona Busines Centre introduces new iLounge
text:
Hotel Arts Barcelona Busines Centre introduces new iLounge Hotel Arts Barcelona Busines Centre introduces new iLounge Details Category: Hotel   15:45 The new iLounge brings the latest technological Apple equipment to the Hotel Arts Barcelona Business Center The iLounge is an innovative new work space, offering guests on access to the latest Apple computer technologies at Hotel Arts Barcelona. The open and innovative iLounge space, seeks to create a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere to work and interact in and features five Apple iMac computers and three Apple iPads for guests to use at their leisure. 
The iLounge is situated within close proximity to the hotels meeting and conference rooms, which also incorporate new devices and have updated features. The new iLounge and the refurbishment of the meetings and events spaces has been developed alongisde a team of Apple consultants to provide guests with the necessary equipment to work from the room with guaranteed security and data protection. In turn, the equipment has been adapted to facilitate use by those who regularly use other operating systems. With the launch of the iLounge, Hotel Arts Barcelona has established itself as an ideal venue for meetings and corporate events in the Barcelona area, with 14 fully-equipped meeting rooms and one board room all with advanced technological equipment.
